data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Morigaon, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Morigaon, Assam, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the county of Morigaon.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Father, comfort those who mourn in Morigaon, Assam, India.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

data.prayer: the county of Morigaon has (about) 10,531 people who know Jesus, 11,616 people who know about him culturally, and 935,252 people who are far from Jesus.

Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Assamese (Muslim traditions) people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Assamese (Muslim traditions) people.
Father, remind your church in Morigaon that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Morigaon, Assam, India a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.section_summary:
the county of Morigaon, Assam, India has a population of 957,400.

We estimate Morigaon has 10,531 people who might know Jesus, 11,616 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 935,252 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Morigaon, Assam, India find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.
